lead_paragraph: Health officials are investigating 17 homegrown cases of the virus, including 13 in the Wynwood neighborhood of Miami.

headline.print_headline: A 500-Square-Foot Area in Miami Is Ground Zero for Zika
headline.main: Patch of Miami Is Ground Zero for the Zika Virus

snippet: Health officials are investigating 17 homegrown cases of the virus, including 13 in the Wynwood neighborhood of Miami....
abstract: Miami public health officials trace first local outbreak of Zika virus to group of people who spent time around two businesses within 500-square-foot area in city's Wynwood section; stress illness is unlikely to spread significantly and launch aggressive mosquito control campaign.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
